Name: Fifth Degree
Instructions: STIR Campari with ice (to coat ice and glass) and then strain to discard excess. Add other ingredients, STIR with coated ice and strain into chilled glass.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2008 which was promoted by Diageo's Reserve Brands division. Apparently, this drink was inspired by the classic Martinez.
Nutrition: One serving of Fifth Degree contains 208 calories
